column9:
Thank you for your email. I will be out of the office on Annual Leave from 25th December – 7th January (inclusive). If your email requires urgent attention. please call Andrew Bullock on 0409 098 708. Otherwise. I shall respond to all emails when I return to work on the 8th January.

Thanks for your patience! Wishing you a very Merry Christmas  - I look forward to working with you in 2009.

With Kind Regards.


Bianca Sowik
